filesharing.core.connection

Class PeerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesharing.core.connection.ConnectionHandler
      • filesharing.core.connection.PeerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ConnectionHandler>

    public class PeerConnection
extends ConnectionHandler
    This is a connection handler for peer connections Extends connection handler with the capability of making requests to peers
